question: Which among the following correctly denotes Capital Adequacy ratio ?
option1: (Tier I Capital )divided by Risk weighted assets
option2: (Tier I Capital + Tier II Capital )divided by Risk weighted asset
option3: (Tier I Capital â€“ Tier II Capital )divided by Risk weighted assets
option4: (Tier II Capital )divided by Risk weighted assets
answer: (Tier I Capital + Tier II Capital )divided by Risk weighted asset
